website_summaries.verdict: Although the Zolo Liberty+ is clearly on the pricy side of Anker’s headphone offerings, its clear and high-class sound, extremely long playtime between charges, and extra-fast Bluetooth pairing are well worth the initial investment.
pros: Up to a whopping 48 hours of playtime per charge
Extraordinary rich sound for such a small device
Adjustable design to fill all ears
Microphones optimized for your phone’s voice recognition technology
cons: These wireless headphones are the most expensive option available from Anker, but that’s only because they’re the best

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended warranty-you’ll need it
customer_reviews.text: These have been my go to in ear listening devices for a little over a year now and as luck would have it, at one year and one month the left channel has ceased operation. It was spotty before in its connectivity but now it’s just gone. So much for a one year warranty. Thanks Zolo.
customer_reviews.author: STLricky

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality Degrades!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality degraded extremely quickly, they sounded pretty good at first, (and I've had a lot of high quality earbuds) but within 2 weeks the sound had almost completely degraded to the point I could barely understand it and everything is on the same level. Had issues with the charging case not disconnecting the earbuds, and not charging them either. Possible mine were defective but I was so displeased I put them in a drawer and totally forgot about them, missed my return window
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Andhobbes

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Watching the advertising materials, one would think this product is good and suitable for the purposes stated (workout). However, in reality, the product is much bigger than it looks on the video. It is just massively sticking out of the ears. Also, and that could be personal, one of the earphones does not fit my ear with any combination of the sets provided. So, I constantly have to put it back in. With the same price as Apple, I expected to have a similar product but I was wrong. Bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: otosipa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well with iPhone 6s.
customer_reviews.text: The product is built well. I bought this over the apple airpods, because Dave Lee's video. But my unit has some sync/pairing issue. I'm using an iPhone 6s. First, it drops pairing a lot. I had to put back into the case and reset it at least once every day. Second, it went out of sync every time I turn my head for no reason. Either left or right earbud briefly muted then resumed. It annoyed me so much because I used it in the gym. Not sure if it's because my phone doesn't have Bluetooth 5.0. But overall, I'm slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price :(
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed. Sound is pretty good although quiet and the charging case holds a long charge which is convenient but I purchased these mostly for the Bluetooth 5.0 where I hoped better connectivity but I still can't walk with my phone in my pocket without it cutting out. Also they don't always pair when you take them out and it's awkward knowing when to have to manually turn them on. This is the only product I have ever not considered 5 stars from Anker which I do think is a fantastic company, I just don't know how these ended up falling so short.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Terrible durability.
customer_reviews.text: I'm about to get my thrid replacement. Setting always breaks or stops charging, I bought the soundcore air at Best buy and they to stopped charging at this point I believe this brand is to blame with headphones. Here is hoping my thrid replacement works out. My jaybird runs, my Jabra elite 65t, and bragi dash all lasted me longer then these ones so the problem isn't me. So disappointed. I really believed in them for the amazing cables, batteries, and speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Greene

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to Airpods
customer_reviews.text: I also own airpods but I find myself using the ZOLO much more. The main reason is that the ZOLOs feel very secure in my ear. When I am wearing them, I have no fear that they are going to accidentally fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Mazuo

customer_reviews.title: Bad connection
customer_reviews.text: This product suffer from a good connectivity between phone. It’s lag so bad and it is not worth your money to buy for. Wouldn’t recommend to anybody that want to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Secure in your ear and has amazing sound.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son-in-law both have these earphones and raved about them. So I purchased myself a pair. They are great. I love how they lock into your ears and feel very secure. I have small ears and yet they fit me perfect. And the sound is amazing. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 minths
customer_reviews.text: I really love these headphones even better than any Apple airpods however quality is a problem. Mine broke down after just six months of owning them.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Carter

customer_reviews.title: These took my breath away at how great they are.
customer_reviews.text: INSTANTLY you'll know that these are different than anything you've experienced. Great price, value, and quality. Let's hope that I won't get to review your customer service. :-) So one day one, these are truly GREAT! Bravo!! A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Loesch

customer_reviews.title: Almost there.
customer_reviews.text: So I received the product and it's really well designed. However it sticks out of your ears a bit too much and keeps falling out. I really wanted to love the product but unfortunately due to these flaws I had to return the product
customer_reviews.author: Omed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good all-around reliable headphones.
customer_reviews.text: There comfortable, superb sound quality, and they stay in your ears easier than i thought they would, if the stock buds don't work they quick you plenty of other buds to fit all sizes of ear. The only thing I'd recommend against these, is that they do look quite big in the ear. I would like some smaller earbuds of course, but if your not looking for fashion, these earbuds are perfect for any need.
customer_reviews.author: Jaidin

customer_reviews.title: Left piece stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months of regular use the left piece stopped working. Have tried every possible setting on several devices and still nothing. Not what I expected for a device on this price range from a well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Keren Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these earbuds! They fit just right with the optional attachments. The sound quality is great! The phone sounds good, but difficult for others to me hear me from time to time. Overall 5 Star!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Overall great earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Love the active mics when you need to hear your surroundings Good sound quality - especially when you have both on. Love the case and battery life. Cons They are pretty large. These are not very conspicuous. Little difficult to get in and out of case and ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good, but the quality of this product isn’t.
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds work pretty good before the Bluetooth stops working. And the Bluetooth just worked for 12 month in the case that I didn’t use it very often. So if you want to spend this amount of money just for 12 months’ service then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaixuan Gao

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with my left earbud, Anker was very responsive and suggested some fixes. When they did not work, I was given a free replacement within days.
customer_reviews.author: Dritan Muneka

customer_reviews.title: First Anker product I'm unhappy with
customer_reviews.text: Only one side has a microphone, have to have both headphones out of the case to use the one with the mic. Love Anker products but this one really missed the mark,
customer_reviews.author: WFoy

customer_reviews.title: Only good if you enjoy listening to every other second of music
customer_reviews.text: Audio is decent when it works, but most of the time the audio pops out every other second. I wish I was exaggerating, but they're basically useless at the gym unless you really like being angry at your ears the whole time. Seemed to be ok when I first got them, from Kickstarter, but these days they don't get any use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Strelkov

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is a little low.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but only if download the zolo app and find an eq setting that works for you. With the balanced eq I think they sound good for small earbuds. Just wish they lasted a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed them until about a month ago when they started ...
customer_reviews.text: First time owning a pair of wireless earbuds and I don't think I can ever go back. Went through a lot of reviews and decided on the Zolo Liberty+, which I bought about 6 months ago. I really enjoyed them until about a month ago when they started malfunctioning (they would disconnect and make some distorted sounds and refuse to reconnect)--but I contacted customer support and they were very responsive and sent me a replacement within a week (thanks Anny!). Definitely recommend them as a first-time owner of wireless earbuds for their quality, as well as Anker's great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Yugo Hamada Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: i dont like it
customer_reviews.text: if i make call or play pubg with mic >> just work one earpuds
customer_reviews.author: ryoood

customer_reviews.title: Another great anker product
customer_reviews.text: These are as solid as all other anker headphones I own. No issues at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Zolo Liberty+ Total-Wireless Earphones, Bluetooth Earbuds with Graphene Driver Technology and 48 Hours Battery Life, Sweatproof Total-Wireless Earbuds with Smart AI and Toggle Sound Isolation
product_meta.description:
Cut The Cord
With no cords or wires to tie you down, Total-Wireless Earphones will change the way you listen to music forever. Take your workout to the next level and or escape from the boredom of your commute.

Immersive Sound
Precision oscillation for superior sound is produced by Liberty's carefully designed graphene-coated drivers. With their rigid yet extremely light construction, the drivers effectively boost treble and clarity for breathtaking audio.

Long-Lasting Battery
3.5 hours of playtime is boosted by the powerful charging case for an incredible 48 hours of play time. Power your commute for a week without needing to bring a charging cable with you.

Instant Connection
PUSH AND GO makes connecting your devices easy—simply take Liberty out of the charging case and connect via your phone's Bluetooth menu. After the initial setup Liberty automatically connects when removed from the case and disconnects when returned.

One Tap Activation
Just one tap toggles sound isolation for better awareness or activates your favorite AI Assistant. Liberty's microphones are optimised for voice recognition, so you'll get the answers you need, fast.

Find Your Perfect Fit
GripFit technology ensures Liberty fits comfortably, yet securely in your ear. Simply slide in and turn to lock. Your earphones are personalized further with the addition of silky smooth liquid silicon EarTips and GripJackets in multiple sizes.
feature_bullets: 【No Wires, No Limits】Flagship Total-Wireless Earphones with revolutionary graphene-augmented drivers, adjustable ambient sound levels, and extended battery life.
【Graphene-Powered Sound】Pioneering audio technology delivers jaw-dropping clarity and treble. A sound-tight seal generates deep bass with exceptional isolation.
【48 Hours of Power】Get 3.5 hours of playtime from a single charge then boost that to 48 with the included charging case.
【Smart To Use】PUSH AND GO ensures ultra-fast pairing between devices, while a simple tap activates your Smart AI or toggles sound isolation to keep you aware of your surroundings.
【What You Get】Liberty+ Total-Wireless Earphones, Liberty+ Charging Case, 4 x GripFit Jackets, 3 x EarTips and Micro-USB Cable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars120 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
